items.title: Create a Killer Online Portfolio To Get Your Dream Job
items.headline: Super-charge Your Career & Learn the Secrets Top Creative Professionals Use to Get the Best Jobs & Clients
objectives_summary: Create a show-stopping professional portfolio and master skills that will help you get your dream job, projects and clients
Design and build a complete portfolio website using WordPress
Understand what Creative Directors & Hiring Managers are looking for and how to connect with them in powerful, effective ways

items.title: Putting the boom into your Zoom
items.headline: Best practices for stellar virtual conferences, meetings and webinars
objectives_summary: How to set up and professionally lead great meetings in Zoom
How to look and sound your best online without the need for special equipment
How to use features such as Zoom breakout rooms, polling and chat

items.title: CV Writing Masterclass with Resume Templates Included
items.headline: 2 CV templates inside to help with the Job Search. Career development starts with writing a compelling resume.
objectives_summary: Get 2 Professional Resume Templates
Write a Resume That Will Impress in 7 Seconds
Land More Job Interviews

items.title: Career Success Secrets To Land Your Dream Job
items.headline: Discover Your Purpose, Build your Resume/LinkedIn, Write a Cover Letter, Search for Jobs & Impress In Your Interview!
objectives_summary: Strategies that you can use in the post-COVID19 world to search for and secure a job that is suited for you.

Explore your likes, dislikes, values and everything that drives and motivates you relating to your career. You will receive exercises that will provide you with the opportunity to review your past and present and create a meaningful vision for your future.
Craft a personalised roadmap that will get you to a meaningful, fulfilling career that suits your personality and where you are in your life right now.

items.title: Start A New Career By Being A Part-Time Sports Writer
items.headline: Combine your love of sports and writing to create a new freelance, part-time or full-time career as a sports writer!
objectives_summary: Learn how to be a sports writer with little or no experience.
Learn how your lack of a college degree or your age can keep you from being a sports writer.
How to gain sports writing experience and learn more about sports.

items.title: Success Masterclass - Become Successful At Anything Quickly
items.headline: Step-by-Step To Your Success & Powerful Proven Strategies To Become Successful Now
objectives_summary: Define their personal success & know how to work toward it
Work with their skillset properly & become highly successful at one (or more) skill(s)
Understand themselves better & be able to set reasonable daily, short-term, middle-term & long-term goals

items.title: Retirement Lifestyle Planning Basics

visible_instructors.title: Sean Radlich
visible_instructors.job_title: Coach and Mentor helping people retire their way
visible_instructors.name: Sean

items.headline: Retire Better. Smarter. Happier.
objectives_summary: You'll learn the basics about planning for a full retirement lifestyle. We'll focus on travel, hobbies, volunteering, health and of course money. Quizes, exercises and action steps will make this course both informative and fun.

items.title: London Reception Academy
items.headline: Master the mindset to be a confident, professional receptionist through customer service, telephone and people skills.
objectives_summary: Master the skills to understand true telephone etiquette.
Learn what is required as a professional receptionist role with the breakdown of duties.
Master the correct speech, grammar, expression & voice inflection when on the telephone and face to face.

items.title: Ace Your Maths Interview - TOP Questions & Answers
items.headline: A Guide to Common Job Interview Questions in Probability, Mathematics, Brain Teasers and Logic
objectives_summary: Tackle common interview questions in Probability, Mathematics, Brain Teasers and Logic
Develop techniques to solve unfamiliar interview questions

items.title: HOW TO BECOME A PRO IN ALL ASPECTS OF ACTING SKILLS

visible_instructors.name: Ria
visible_instructors.job_title: Trinity College London Accredited Teacher in Speech & Drama
visible_instructors.title: Ria Vorster

items.headline: Acting is a skill.  Many of us are born with the desire to entertain through the dramatic arts.
objectives_summary: To go for auditions in any genre of the dramatic arts. To take part in Eisteddfods, competitions, concerts and other opportunities to show off your talent. To use this course as a teaching tool for schools and studios.

items.title: Innovating Your Career
items.headline: A practical guide to kick-starting your career adventure
objectives_summary: Adopt and apply a creative mindset to developing your career
Effectively demonstrate your skills and employability
Start finding and creating career opportunities

items.title: Health and safety in the workplace
items.headline: For health care professionals, or anyone interested in health and safety in the UK
objectives_summary: Students will gain a knowledge of health and safety at work here in the UK.  They will understand the legislation that underpins health and safety at work, but this could equally apply to the home and everyday life.

items.title: Fastest Route From Developer to CTO
items.headline: The Unicorn CTO
objectives_summary: Students will Learn about role of CTO
What are the CTO’s key responsibilities?
Monitor KPIs and IT Budgets

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist ♦ Art Teacher ♦ Author ♦ Fibre Arts
visible_instructors.title: Aerie North

items.headline: Write a great artist bio so that you can sell art in art galleries & museum shops + Over 700 galleries & museums
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, students will be able to write their artist bio.
At the end of the course, stidents will know how and where to sell their art to art directors and curators in art galleries, boutiques, and museum shops.

Avoid making the typical mistakes that cost people landing the job they want

items.headline: A Simple, Science-Based Approach to Getting The Career You Deserve.
